General.Name: Konya Kagit Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Konya Kagit Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells paper products in Turkey. It offers roll, standard size, and photocopy standard papers; offset printed laminated cardboard box packaging products; spiraled and single-centered wire-bound school notebooks, spiral cardboard cover and plastic spiral PP cover notebooks, separator notebooks, calligraphy notebooks, and drawing notebooks and papers; and parchment papers, cube blocks, A4/A5 notepads, and background cardboards. The company also exports its products. Konya Kagit Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1989 and is based in Konya, Turkey.
